description: Jodie Starling was introduced as http://anidb.net/ch2343 [Mouri Ran]`s English teacher under the name of http://anidb.net/ch8975 [Jodie Saintemillion]. She is later revealed to be an FBI agent with a personal vendetta against http://anidb.net/ch8206 [Vermouth] who murdered her father. She knows of http://anidb.net/ch2260 [Edogawa Conan]`s detective skills and often has him help the FBI to battle the Black Organization.
name: Jodie Starling
